data.actual_result: The search bar will appear for a split second, notably since the description will move
data.expected_result: Since there are no bans, the search bar shouldn't appear
data.short_description: In a server with no bans, the search bar will appear for a split second
data.steps_to_repro: - go to or create a server and make sure nobody is banned - go to the server settings > bans - observe (this can only be repeated when exiting the server settings fully and then re-trying)
